title: My November Discoveries
description: An article about my favorite, tools, thoughts, experiences and people.

body.raw:
### Technology
This month i discovered a lot of technology that inspired my to start deep diving into developing again. I had a lot of fun with getting a deeper understanding of how NextJs works.  
- [Obsidian Markdown](https://obsidian.md/)
- [NextJS](https://nextjs.org)
- [Arc Browser](https://arc.net/)
- [Cosmos](https://www.cosmos.so/)

I also got back into writing by using obsidian again. Obsidian is an amazing writing tool that allows you to link your thoughts together just as they are in your brain. Obsidian allows me to create ideas organicly and aligned with the way my thoughts evolve in my brain


--- 

### People
Deep dived more into the design community on [X](https://twitter.com/) . I discovereds a a few very inspiring and interesing people that i would like to share because i think they are doing great work. 
- [Rauno Freiberg](https://rauno.me/)
- [Alex Carpenter](https://alexcarpenter.me/) 
- [Linus Rogge](https://linusrogge.com/)
- [Anton StallbÃ¶rger](https://antonstallboerger.com/)
- [Florian Kiem](floriankiem.com/)
- [Nils Eller](https://www.nilseller.com/)
- [Emil Kowalski](https://emilkowal.ski/)

and many more...


---

### Ressources
Ressources i discovered this month that i rather find interesting, inspiring or just beautiful. 
- [Invisible Details of Interaction Design by Rauno Freiberg](https://rauno.me/craft/interaction-design)
    - a super interesting elaboration on small details that seperates amazing interactions from the average ones.
- [The Road to Becoming Obsidian's CEO - Interview with Stephen Ango](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z58FsjT-UO8)
- [The Remove lists > goals and visions](https://www.0xshapeshifter.dev/journal/removelist)
